transcript: a lot of people like to make their rumes about their accomplishments but what I think that does is it gives us an inflated mental image of ourselves and so if you make yourself a failure resume I think it creates the equal opposite situation which is you're like man I have really messed up a lot of times over and over again and there's a lot of valuable things you can take from that number one is that and probably the most important I am still here if there's one big takeaway from that it's like you have survived and this actually leads to a frame in and of itself which is if it kills you it won't matter because you'll be dead if it doesn't kill you it means you can handle it and so either way you win
